channel.title: Pkp Farming Prevention & Starter tradeing
channel.description: Hey guys I was wondering if any one knew a simple code to put in so that a starter cant trade for 15mins+ and a timer so you cant get more than 1 pkp per 30 mins from the same person that you just killed
